description: Four ingredients is all you need to whip up this easy and satisfying dinner. This chicken wings recipe is sure to become a new family favourite.
keywords: Chicken wrap,Quick & easy dinner,Weeknight dinner,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken
name: Chicken Wings With Chips & Tangy Hot Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g Woolworths BBQ slow cooked smokey chicken wings with tangy hot sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230°C/210°C fan-forced. Cook chips according to packet instructions. Season with chicken salt.
Meanwhile, remove chicken from packet and reserve sauce. Cook chicken on barbecue according to packet instructions.
Prepare salad according to packet instructions.
Serve chicken with reserved sauce, salad and chips.
